summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4714 for the improvement of West Hanford Street from 36th Avenue Southwest to Belvidere Avenue by paving, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54558, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
